variable.name: race
variable.comment: Administrative race assignment [cases] Administrative race assignment [controls]

variable.name: ethnicity_assignment
variable.comment: Ethnicity clusters from PCs of total population (Mclust package) [cases] Ethnicity clusters from PCs of total population (Mclust package) [controls]

variable.name: smoking
variable.comment: Implementation of the CTAKES Algorithm [cases] Implementation of the CTAKES Algorithm [controls]

variable.name: smokingcode
variable.comment: One or more entries of ICD-9 305.1 or V15.82 [cases] One or more entries of ICD-9 305.1 or V15.82 [controls]

variable.name: followup_time
variable.description: Follow-up time of cancer participant's visit

variable.name: breast_CEU
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 primary code for malignant neoplasm of the female breast and all sub-codes on separate clinic visits OR a tumor registry entry for breast cancer AND female [cases] For women over 40 years of age, we required that records contain at least one mammography Bi-Rad score as 1 (negative) or 2 (benign) [controls]

variable.name: breast_YRI
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 primary code for malignant neoplasm of the female breast and all sub-codes on separate clinic visits OR a tumor registry entry for breast cancer AND female [cases] For women over 40 years of age, we required that records contain at least one mammography Bi-Rad score as 1 (negative) or 2 (benign) [controls]

variable.name: breastNoInsitu_CEU
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 primary code for malignant neoplasm of the female breast and all sub-codes on separate clinic visits OR a tumor registry entry for breast cancer AND female [cases] For women over 40 years of age, we required that records contain at least one mammography Bi-Rad score as 1 (negative) or 2 (benign) [controls]

variable.name: breastNoInsitu_YRI
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 primary code for malignant neoplasm of the female breast and all sub-codes on separate clinic visits OR a tumor registry entry for breast cancer AND female [cases] For women over 40 years of age, we required that records contain at least one mammography Bi-Rad score as 1 (negative) or 2 (benign) [controls]

variable.name: colorectal_CEU
variable.comment: Tumor registry entry for colorectal cancer [cases] We required for patients over 50 years of age the keyword "colonoscopy" in the problem list OR a procedure code for colonoscopy [controls]

variable.comment: Tumor registry entry for colorectal cancer [cases] We required for patients over 50 years of age the keyword "colonoscopy" in the problem list OR a procedure code for colonoscopy [controls]

variable.comment: Tumor registry entry for ovarian cancer AND female [cases]

variable.name: prostate_CEU
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.name: prostate_YRI
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.name: prostate_CEU_aggressive
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.name: prostate_CEU_grade
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.name: prostate_YRI_aggressive
variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]

variable.comment: Three or more mentions of ICD-9 codes for malignant neoplasm of prostate OR tumor registry entry for prostate cancer [cases] For male controls aged 40 years and greater to have at least one prostate specific antigen (PSA) level <4 and that the most recent PSA level is within the normal range [controls]
